summary: Integrated Phase 6.9 postmortem into documentation. File created at /docs/release_notes/PHASE_6.9_POSTMORTEM.md, link added to docs/RELEASE_NOTES.md, and task marked complete in /TASK_CARDS.md.

content.details: Created three MCP-compliant YAML plan templates and integrated them into the bluelabel new-plan command. Templates: basic-single-agent, multi-agent-dag, approval-gated-flow. CLI now supports --template flag for new-plan. All templates pass lint. See TASK_CARDS.md for details.

Added --dry-run and --summary flags to bluelabel run. Dry-run mode outputs execution order, DAG layers, agent routing, approvals/blockers. Summary mode gives one-liner per task. Tested with linear, parallel, diamond, approval-gated, and multi-agent plans. Cycles and missing dependencies flagged. No agent execution in dry-run. See TASK_CARDS.md for details.

Created ARCH_CONTINUITY.md and AGENT_SCORECARD.md in /docs/system/. Moved AGENT_ORCHESTRATION_GUIDE.md to /docs/system/ and updated with System Metadata section. Confirmed file contents, move, and references. Recommend updating at each sprint boundary and after major agent role changes. See TASK_CARDS.md for summary.

Created /postbox/WA/WA_BOOT.md with WA's operating protocol and checklist requirements. Linked in /WA_CHECKLIST.md under Reference. File content matches ARCH-AI instructions. See TASK_CARDS.md for summary.

CA Reports.summary: Created ARCH-AI Role Context File for onboarding, handover, and reinitialization.
clarifying_assumptions: ARCH-AI is always subordinate to the human ARCH but retains planning authority for agent prompts and sprint structure.
ARCH-AI does not execute tasks directly but coordinates prompt and plan generation.
suggestions_for_future: Expand with example prompt cycles and merge/tag instructions.
Add a section for common pitfalls and recovery scenarios.
Include a changelog for each update at milestone tags.

CA Reports.summary: Updated agent scorecard for WA and CA based on TASK-150E reassignment and outcome.
updated_fields: WA: Noted incorrect assignment, unscoped DAG validation, work not merged, score lowered for CLI ownership and self-correction.
CA: Noted reassignment, rapid completion, improved score for CLI clarity and execution speed.
